Package com.graphs.utils

Class GraphRunner

java.lang.Object
com.graphs.utils.GraphRunner
public class GraphRunner extends Object
This class implements testing behaviour of Graph class.
Since:
1.0
Version:
JDK 1.4
Author:
≈Åukasz Malara

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static void run(boolean allowExceptions)
      This method runs a test of Graph class behaviour.
      Parameters:
      allowExceptions - if true run exceptions test as well, if false run basic test only.
      Since:
      1.0

    • initRun

      private static void initRun()
      This method initializes run of a test.
      Since:
      1.0

    • initRunExceptions

      private static void initRunExceptions()
      This method initializes run of exceptions test. None exception requires handling or catching outside this method.
      Since:
      1.0

    • findAvailableFiles

      private static String @NotNull [] findAvailableFiles()
      This method finds names of every available file in RESOURCES_PATH directory.
      Returns:
      an array of available files names.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printConditionalMessage

      private static void printConditionalMessage(boolean condition, String baseMessage, String ifTrue, String ifFalse)
      This method prints conditional message as a feedback of other methods.
      Parameters:
      condition - condition to verify its satisfaction to determine which message option should be printed in a feedback.
      baseMessage - message that is printed besides satisfaction of a condition.
      ifTrue - message that is printed if condition is satisfied.
      ifFalse - message that is printed if condition is unsatisfied.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printSeparator

      private static void printSeparator()
      This method prints separator.
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      • SEPARATOR

    • setGraphFromFile

      private static void setGraphFromFile(String file) throws NegativeVertexIndexException
      This method sets graph based on a structure defined in a file given as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      file - name of a file containing graph structure definition.
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if file contains negative number(s).
      Since:
      1.0

    • setGraphToEmpty

      private static void setGraphToEmpty()
      This method prints feedback message about setting graph to an empty.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printGraph

      private static void printGraph()
      This method prints graph structure.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printIfVerticesAdded

      private static void printIfVerticesAdded(Collection<Integer> vertices) throws NegativeVertexIndexException
      This method prints feedback message if vertices given as a parameter have been added to graph.
      Parameters:
      vertices - Collection of a vertices indexes to add to graph.
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if given Collection contains negative number(s).
      Since:
      1.0

    • printIfVerticesRemoved

      private static void printIfVerticesRemoved(Collection<Integer> vertices) throws NegativeVertexIndexException, NoSuchVertexIndexException
      This method prints feedback message if vertices given as a parameter have been removed from graph.
      Parameters:
      vertices - Collection of a vertices indexes to remove from graph.
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if given Collection contains negative number(s).
      NoSuchVertexIndexException - if Collection contains any indexes that could not be identified with any vertex of graph.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printIfVerticesConnected

      private static void printIfVerticesConnected(int indexI, int indexJ) throws NegativeVertexIndexException, NoSuchVertexIndexException
      This method prints feedback message if vertices given as a parameter of graph have been connected.
      Parameters:
      indexI - index of a vertex
      indexJ - index of another vertex
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if any int < 0.
      NoSuchVertexIndexException - if graph does not contain either vertices with indexes type int given as a parameter.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printIfVerticesDisconnected

      private static void printIfVerticesDisconnected(int indexI, int indexJ) throws NegativeVertexIndexException, NoSuchVertexIndexException
      This method prints feedback message if vertices given as a parameter of graph have been disconnected.
      Parameters:
      indexI - index of a vertex
      indexJ - index of another vertex
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if any int < 0.
      NoSuchVertexIndexException - if graph does not contain either vertices with indexes type int given as a parameter.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printGraphComplete

      private static void printGraphComplete()
      This method prints feedback message about setting graph to a complete.
      Since:
      1.0

      private static void printMDS()
      This method prints computed minimal dominating set in graph.

      This method prints computed maximal independent set in graph.

    • printIsConnectedDominatingSet

      private static void printIsConnectedDominatingSet(Collection<Integer> vertices) throws NegativeVertexIndexException, NoSuchVertexIndexException
      This method prints feedback message whether given subset as a parameter is a connected dominating set in graph or is not.
      Parameters:
      vertices - Collection of a vertices indexes to check if they form a connected dominating set in graph.
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if given Collection contains negative number(s).
      NoSuchVertexIndexException - if Collection contains any indexes that could not be identified with any vertex of graph.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printIsIndependentSet

      private static void printIsIndependentSet(Collection<Integer> vertices) throws NegativeVertexIndexException, NoSuchVertexIndexException
      This method prints feedback message whether given subset as a parameter is an independent set in graph or is not.
      Parameters:
      vertices - Collection of a vertices indexes to check if they form a connected dominating set in graph.
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if given Collection contains negative number(s).
      NoSuchVertexIndexException - if Collection contains any indexes that could not be identified with any vertex of graph.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printIsBipartite

      private static void printIsBipartite()
      This method prints feedback message whether graph is bipartite or is not.
      Since:
      1.0

    • doInducePatternMessage

      private static void doInducePatternMessage(boolean induces, String baseMessage)
      This method prints feedback message about satisfaction of inducing subgraph of graph by some set.
      Parameters:
      induces - condition to verify inducing subgraph of graph by some set.
      baseMessage - message that is printed besides condition satisfaction.
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      • printConditionalMessage(boolean, String, String, String)

    • printDoInduceConnectedSubGraph

      private static void printDoInduceConnectedSubGraph(Collection<Integer> vertices) throws NegativeVertexIndexException, NoSuchVertexIndexException
      This method prints feedback message whether given subset as a parameter induces connected subgraph of graph or does not.
      Parameters:
      vertices - Collection of a vertices indexes to check if they induce connected subgraph of graph.
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if given Collection contains negative number(s).
      NoSuchVertexIndexException - if Collection contains any indexes that could not be identified with any vertex of graph.
      Since:
      1.0

    • printDoInduceBipartiteSubGraph

      private static void printDoInduceBipartiteSubGraph(Collection<Integer> vertices) throws NegativeVertexIndexException, NoSuchVertexIndexException
      This method prints feedback message whether given subset as a parameter induces bipartite subgraph of graph or it does not.
      Parameters:
      vertices - Collection of a vertices indexes to check if they induce bipartite subgraph of graph.
      Throws:
      NegativeVertexIndexException - if given Collection contains negative number(s).
      NoSuchVertexIndexException - if Collection contains any indexes that could not be identified with any vertex of graph.
      Since:
      1.0
